prompt: Create a simple drum beat with kick and snare
code: s("bd sd").gain(0.9)

prompt: Make a fast techno beat with hi-hats
code: stack(s("bd ~ bd ~"), s("hh*8").gain(0.6)).cpm(120)

prompt: Play a slow ambient melody
code: n("c4 e4 g4 ~").s("sine").gain(0.7).slow(2).room(0.5).cpm(60)

prompt: Create a layered pattern with drums, bass, and melody
code: stack(s("bd sd bd sd").gain(0.9), n("0 0 ~ 3").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.8), n("c4 e4 g4 ~").s("sine").gain(0.6)).cpm(90)

prompt: Generate a jazz chord progression with swing
Make a hip-hop beat with 808s and snappy snares
code: stack(s("bd*2 ~ bd ~").gain(1.0), s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.9).delay(0.25), s("hh*4").gain(0.4), n("0 ~ 3 0").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.8)).cpm(85)

prompt: Create a lo-fi hip-hop beat
code: stack(s("bd ~ bd ~").gain(0.7), s("~ sd ~ ~").gain(0.5).room(0.5), s("hh hh hh hh").gain(0.25).cutoff(2000)).slow(2).cutoff(1800).room(0.4).cpm(85)

prompt: Make a chill lo-fi beat with jazzy chords
code: stack(s("bd ~ bd ~").gain(0.6), s("~ sd ~ ~").gain(0.4).room(0.6), note("<[d3,f3,a3] [g3,b3,d4]>").s("sine").gain(0.35).cutoff(800).room(0.7)).slow(2).cutoff(1500).room(0.5).cpm(80)

prompt: Create a minimal house track with filtered pads
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.9), s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.8), s("hh*8").gain(0.5).pan(rand), n("<c4 e4 g4 a4>").s("sawtooth").cutoff(sine.range(200, 2000)).gain(0.6).slow(4)).cpm(120)

prompt: Create an arpeggiated synth melody with reverb
code: n("<c4 e4 g4 b4 c5 g4 e4 c4>").s("triangle").fast(2).gain(0.7).room(0.8).size(0.9).cutoff(1500).cpm(90)

prompt: Make a polyrhythmic percussion pattern
Generate a dark techno bassline with distortion
code: stack(s("bd ~ bd bd").gain(1.0), n("0 ~ 5 3").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(300).distort(0.4).gain(0.9), s("hh*8").gain(0.4).pan(sine)).cpm(130)

prompt: Make a glitchy IDM pattern with random elements
code: stack(s("bd? ~ sd? ~").sometimes(rev).gain(0.8), n("0 3 5 7").s("triangle").fast(2).gain(0.6).cutoff(rand.range(400, 3000)), s("hh*8").degradeBy(0.3).gain(0.5)).cpm(95)

prompt: Create a reggae rhythm with offbeat chords
Generate a dubstep wobble bass pattern
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~ bd ~ sd ~").gain(0.95), n("0 0 0 0").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(sine.range(100, 2500).fast(8)).resonance(0.5).gain(0.9), s("hh*4").gain(0.4)).cpm(140)

prompt: Make a minimal ambient drone with evolving texture
code: stack(n("c2").s("sawtooth").cutoff(sine.range(50, 400).slow(8)).gain(0.5).room(0.9).size(0.9), n("<c4 e4 g4>").s("sine").gain(perlin.range(0.2, 0.5)).slow(4), s("~ ~ ~ bd").gain(0.3).delay(0.5)).cpm(40)

prompt: Create a funk groove with syncopated bass
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ bd ~ ~").gain(0.9), s("~ cp ~ ~ ~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.8), n("0 ~ 3 5 ~ 7 3 ~").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.85).cutoff(800), s("hh*8").gain(0.5).sometimes(fast(2))).cpm(95)

prompt: Generate a classical-inspired string pattern
Make a trap beat with hi-hat rolls
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd").gain(0.95), s("~ ~ cp ~ ~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.85).delay(0.25), s("hh*2 hh*2 hh*4 hh*8").fast(2).gain(0.6), n("0 ~ ~ 3").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.9)).cpm(140)

prompt: Create an evolving ambient soundscape with delays
code: stack(n("c4 e4 g4 a4 c5 a4 g4 e4").s("sine").slow(4).gain(0.5).delay(0.5).delaytime(0.375).delayfeedback(0.6), n("c2").s("sawtooth").cutoff(200).gain(0.4).room(0.9), s("~ ~ ~ bd").gain(0.25).delay(0.75)).cpm(50)

prompt: Create a deep house track
Make a drum and bass beat
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd sd ~ bd ~").fast(2).gain(0.9), s("hh*8").gain(0.5), n("0 ~ ~ 0").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(250).gain(0.85)).cpm(174)

prompt: Create a synthwave track with arpeggios
code: stack(s("bd ~ sd ~").gain(0.85), s("hh*4").gain(0.4), n("<c4 e4 g4 b4 c5 b4 g4 e4>").s("sawtooth").fast(2).gain(0.6).cutoff(1800).room(0.4), note("<[c3,e3,g3] [a2,c3,e3] [f3,a3,c4] [g3,b3,d4]>").s("triangle").gain(0.4).slow(2)).cpm(110)

prompt: Make a trance anthem with building energy
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.9), s("~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.7), s("hh*8").gain(0.5), n("<c4 d4 e4 g4 a4 g4 e4 d4>").s("sawtooth").fast(2).gain(0.6).cutoff(sine.range(800, 3000).slow(4)).room(0.6)).cpm(140)

prompt: Create a downtempo trip-hop beat
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd ~").gain(0.75), s("~ ~ sd ~ ~ ~ ~ ~").gain(0.6).room(0.5), note("<[d3,f3,a3] [c3,e3,g3]>").s("sine").gain(0.4).cutoff(600).room(0.6).slow(2)).slow(2).cpm(90)

prompt: Make a UK garage 2-step beat
code: stack(s("bd ~ [~ bd] ~").gain(0.85), s("~ cp ~ ~").gain(0.7), s("hh*4").gain(0.5).pan(rand), n("0 ~ 3 ~").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.8)).cpm(132)

prompt: Create a chiptune 8-bit melody
code: stack(s("bd ~ sd ~").gain(0.8).crush(8), n("<c5 e5 g5 c6 b5 g5 e5 c5>").s("square").gain(0.6).crush(10), n("c3 c3 g3 g3").s("square").octave(2).gain(0.5).crush(10)).cpm(140)

prompt: Make a boom bap hip-hop beat
Create an acid techno track with 303 bassline
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.9), s("~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.7), s("hh*8").gain(0.45), n("0 0 3 0 5 0 7 5").s("sawtooth").octave(2).cutoff(sine.range(200, 2500).fast(2)).resonance(0.6).gain(0.8)).cpm(135)

prompt: Make a vaporwave slowed track
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~").gain(0.5).room(0.7), note("<[c4,e4,g4] [a3,c4,e4] [f4,a4,c5]>").s("sine").gain(0.4).cutoff(800).room(0.8).delay(0.4)).slow(3).cpm(70)

prompt: Create electronic dub with heavy delay
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~").gain(0.85), s("~ ~ sd ~").gain(0.7).delay(0.6).delaytime(0.375).delayfeedback(0.65), s("~ hh ~ hh").gain(0.4).delay(0.4), n("0 ~ ~ 0").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.75)).cpm(130)

prompt: Make a minimal techno groove
Create an industrial EBM beat
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.95).distort(0.2), s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.8).distort(0.3), n("0 0 3 0").s("sawtooth").octave(2).cutoff(400).distort(0.4).gain(0.85)).cpm(125)

prompt: Make an electro-funk groove
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ bd ~ ~").gain(0.85), s("~ cp ~ ~ ~ cp ~ ~").gain(0.75), n("0 ~ 3 5 ~ 7 3 ~").s("bass").octave(2).cutoff(sine.range(400, 1200)).gain(0.8), s("hh*8").gain(0.45)).cpm(108)

prompt: Create a phonk beat with cowbells
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd ~").gain(0.9).distort(0.15), s("~ ~ cp ~ ~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.8), s("~ cb ~ cb").gain(0.6), n("0 ~ 0 ~").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(300).gain(0.85)).slow(2).cpm(130)

prompt: Create a techno track with builds and drops
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.9).every(8, degradeBy(0.7)), s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.7).sometimes(delay(0.25)), s("hh*8").gain(0.5).every(4, fast(1.5)), n("0 0 3 5").s("sawtooth").octave(2).cutoff(sine.range(200, 2500).slow(8)).gain(0.8)).cpm(130)

prompt: Make a house song that evolves
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.85), s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.6).every(8, room(0.6)), s("hh*8").gain(0.4).every(4, x => x.fast(2).gain(0.3)), note("<[c3,e3,g3] [a2,c3,e3] [f3,a3,c4] [g3,b3,d4]>").s("sine").gain(0.5).cutoff(sine.range(400, 1500).slow(16)).room(0.5)).cpm(124)

prompt: Create an evolving ambient piece
code: stack(n("c3 e3 g3 b3").s("sine").slow(4).gain(perlin.range(0.3, 0.6)).room(0.9).delay(0.5), n("c2").s("triangle").cutoff(sine.range(100, 400).slow(16)).gain(0.4), s("~ ~ ~ bd").gain(0.2).room(0.8).every(8, delay(0.6))).cpm(60)

prompt: Make a drum and bass track with breaks
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd sd ~ bd ~").fast(2).gain(0.9).every(8, degradeBy(0.5)), s("hh*8").gain(0.5).every(4, fast(2)), n("0 ~ ~ 0").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(sine.range(150, 800).slow(4)).gain(0.85)).cpm(174)

prompt: Create a trance anthem with build and drop
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.9).every(16, degradeBy(0.8)), s("~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.7), s("hh*8").gain(0.5).every(4, fast(1.5)), n("<c4 d4 e4 g4 a4 g4 e4 d4>").s("sawtooth").fast(2).cutoff(sine.range(600, 4000).slow(16)).room(0.6).gain(0.7)).cpm(140)

prompt: Make a progressive track that builds tension
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.85), s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.6).sometimes(room(0.5)), s("hh*8").gain(0.4).every(8, x => x.fast(2).degradeBy(0.3)), n("0 3 5 7").s("sine").octave(3).cutoff(sine.range(300, 2000).slow(32)).gain(0.6).room(0.4)).cpm(126)
